homeHeaderText:
ON THE occasion of the 70th anniversary of the
liberation of Paris 1944, answer the parisians.
howTo1: Publish your selfie with the hashtag
howTo2: Collect votes from your friends to win !
register.action: FILL IN THE FORM TO TRY TO WIN A TRIP TO PARIS
form.title: Title:

about.what:
2 round-trip flights to PARIS
for 2 people and 4 nights
in a 4* hotel in PARIS.

footer_text: This promotion is not created or endorsed by Facebook. Your information is shared with the CRT Paris Ile de France and not Facebook. The information you share will be used only to contact you regarding this sweepstakes. To read the full terms and conditions, %sclick here%s.
form.errors.fb_connect_ban: This user can't play anymore. Contact us for more details
